name: RevisionLab – Feedback Manager
author: Revision Lab

sections.description:
Our WordPress Plugin makes it simple to install our software into your wordpress site. Simply install the plugin and update your configuration with the project ID supplied when setting up your project.

RevisonLab – Software for Web Development Feedback Management.

RevisionLab is a software to help web development companies more easily manage their feedback and revision process.
It easily integrates into any development website to be used quickly on any project.

Learn more about RevisonLab.

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
How to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure weapons under Settings

short_description: RevisionLab helps agencies and web designers manage feedback and changes from clients.  RevisionLab makes web development easier and faster.
